definition: car/vehicle/CL:輛|辆[liang4]/machine/to shape with a lathe/Kangxi radical 159
front/forward/ahead/first/top (followed by a number)/future/ago/before/BC (e.g. 前293年)/former/formerly

sentences.english: Take the heat out of them with plantain, which has both anti-inflammatory and antiallergenic properties.
sentences.chinese: 可用具有抗炎和抗過敏作用的車前草薰來消炎止癢。

sentences.english: Objective To study the effect of compound plantain ointment in curing bedsore.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究複方車前草軟膏對於褥瘡的治療作用。

sentences.english: Ears, ear stems, and leaves were the parts easily infected with plantain head blight.
sentences.chinese: 車前草穗枯病主要爲害穗部，也爲害穗軸和葉片。

sentences.english: Objective To study the effect of compound plantain ointment in curing bedsore.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究複方車前草軟膏對褥瘡的治療作用。

definition: black atractylodes rhizome (dried rhizome of any of several atractylodes species) (TCM)
mole cricket/Gryllolaptaptidae, family of burrowing insects of order Orthoptera (a serious agricultural pest)
King Solomon's seal (plant of genus Polygonatum)
dwarf lilyturf (Ophiopogon japonicus), its tuber used in TCM
dodder (Cuscuta sinensis, a parasitic vine with seeds used in medicine)
Ningpo figwort (Scrophularia ningpoensis)/root of Ningpo figwort (used in TCM)
liquorice (Sophora flavescens), with roots used in TCM
